descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my terrible accent

I've killed two evenings to create this follower. 2 hours to create face.

I've tryed to create follower, that looks like actress Phoenix Chou

contains simple follower mod and preset for RaceMenu. Follower is in Riverwood, "Slleping Giant" inn

follower may be unbalanced

requires (i guess):

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females by Bella by [b]BellaGail[/b][/url] no makeup
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by [b]Expired[/b][/url] if you want to use preset
author: 1989Max1989
